Farm Fresh

Fresh Produce ・ New York ・ December

Cranberries

A bitter berry that is usually sweetened with sugar when cooked or dried. Great at protecting us against illness.

Buying

Make sure to buy brightly and intensely colored ones, and discard any that are soft, withered, or discolored.

Storing

Don't wash them before storing or they will spoil. Tightly wrapped in a bag, they can be stored for up to two months in the fridge.

Recipes

Pear, Brandy and Walnut Cranberry Sauce

Orange Blossom Candied Cranberries

Gingered Cranberry Fig Chutney

Made with ♡ from NYC
